import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap-v5' import ReactApexChart from "react-apexcharts"; import { chartData } from './ChartData' export default function Swap() { const [chainModal, setChainModal] = useState(false); const [name, setname] = useState('Maximum Return'); const [walletModal, setWalletModal] = useState(false); const [MoreInfo, setMoreInfo] = useState(true); const [currency1, setCurrency1] = useState('ETH'); const [currency2, setCurrency2] = useState('USDT'); const [slippageaction, setSlippageaction] = useState(false) const [selectedSlippage, setSelectedSlippage] = useState('0.5%'); const[currency1Icon,setCurrency1Icon]=useState('ethereum_header.png'); const[currency2Icon,setCurrency2Icon]=useState('bnb.png'); const series = [ { data: chartData, }, ]; const SwapCurrency = () => { const temp = currency1; setCurrency1(currency2); setCurrency2(temp); } return (
